com.scorch.core.modules.data

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scorch.core.modules.AbstractModule
      • com.scorch.core.modules.data.ConnectionManager

  • public class ConnectionManager
extends AbstractModule
    ConnectionManager that handles SQL connections to the database heavily used by DataManager
    Author:
    Gijs de Jong
    See Also:
    DataManager;
